title: CHamp select is over, whole team is still in team select. Last game was literal 4v4 DISABLE RANKED N

replies.body:
same stuck in champ select for a minute so i relog and now stuck at position 1 to get back on.

im guessing servers crashed.
I cant login after a 10 minute wait, my position in queue was one. I was also in a ranked game, guess what that mean? LEAVE, and nothing done by riot.
Same thing just happened to me...
well i gave up. what game should I play now? Civ 5?
cant relog to league after that.... wtf is going on???
Guess ima go sleep then. Gg wp
Lmao same here. Did not receive a response from server now...
